projects.title: TravelMate
projects.subtitle: iPhone App Design
projects.description: 'TravelMate' is an engaging iPhone app for planning trips. It gives users the ability to post travel related questions to get advise from friends who may have visited/lived in those places. The process was divided into different stages:1. Brainstorming & User Research2. Paper Sketches 3. Low fidelity Mockups 4.Working Prototype in FluidUI and Photoshop 5. Usability Testing

projects.title: School Manager
projects.subtitle: Responsive Marketing Website
projects.description: Designed and developed a responsive marketing website using Bootstrap framework for SchoolManager, a distributed web-based software solution currently available to a few schools in Nigeria.

projects.title: Sustainable Earth
projects.subtitle: Illustrative website on environmental awareness
projects.description: Informative website to illustrate an individual's role in maintaining a sustainable earth.Technologies: CSS3 animations and HTML5

projects.title: Zero&One
projects.subtitle: Company Website
projects.description: Customized existing Bootstrap template with company branding requirements and content and images provided.

projects.title: Dream Travels
projects.subtitle: Website for a fictional Travel Agency
projects.description: Travel website for a company to showcase best packages and best deals on offer to its users

projects.title: Travel Journal
projects.subtitle: iPhone App to record trip memories
projects.description: Designed and developed an app that allows a user to capture his travel experiences in a journal format on his iPhone.

projects.title: iThink
projects.subtitle: Facebook Application
projects.description: 'iThink' is an innovative Facebook application to post and share reviews among friends for movies, restaurants, tech gadgets and books.Features : Integrated app with Google Maps, Google Books and Google Search functionality to enhance usability.

projects.title: Weekly Weather Forecast
projects.subtitle: Determine the weather forecast for the city of your choice
projects.description: Single page application to determine the weather forecast for the next 2/5/7 days based on the city entered by user. The app is integrated with the OpenWeathermap API using AngularJS

projects.title: Disha
projects.subtitle: Website for a Non-Profit organization
projects.description: Designed a simple website using Adobe Fonts for a fictional Non-Profit Organization

projects.title: Insurance Tool Picker
projects.subtitle: Single page interface design with breadcrumb navigation
projects.description: Single page application developed based on given design and functional specifications.Main Features : Breadcrumb navigation using jQuery, form validation, ability to add multiple insurers.

projects.title: Chronic Surfing Co.
projects.subtitle: Mockup for a Surfsite company in Photoshop
projects.description: Mock up for a fictional surf site company created using Adobe Photoshop.

projects.title: Floral Creations
projects.subtitle: Template for a Simple Floral company
projects.description: A simple website designed and created in HTML and CSS(3) for a fictional Floral Company.
